Posts.Content: icerobin62 wrote: Hi All, I need some information please.  I have been going to le therapy for about a month.  One arm is up the other down, but i still have a hard place under one upper arm.  The therpaist today asked me what the plan was.  When i was relased in jaunury my numbers were really low.  When should i stop going.  Kind of feel that one of the threapist thinks i am milingering. Thanks Robin Dx 1/20/2006, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 0/36 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: when to stop therapy icerobin62 inspiewriter

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2007 08:05PM icerobin62 wrote: Jinky, I do have sleeves and do mld therapy at home before bed.  No i do not wrap.  I am going to be fitted for a reid sleeve next week.  I guess i am frustrated because we get one area feeling better when i am at therapy and i fill back up three hours later.   I do wear sleeves all day long and do not take them off before bed. Thanks Robin
